About Me

Full-Stack Software Engineer

BIO

I am a full-stack software engineer with a passion for design and functionality.

My goal is to create intelligent, well-designed applications that work at a high level and offer ease of use and accessibility. I am always eager to learn more by collaborating with a team of great programmers or in my own projects.

I am a musician and artist. Being creative has always been a big part of my life. I write and release music on my own and also collaboriate on projects with others. I enjoy painting and drawing and have exhibited my watercolor and charcoal work publicly.
